verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> [T'el-about שֹׁשַׁנִּ֑ים sho-shan-Nim; עֵד֖וּת <S%H7802><s%> 'e-Dut upon Shoshannimeduth לְאָסָ֣ף <S%H623><s%> le-'a-Saf of Asaph מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor. A Psalm רֹ֘עֵ֤ה <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Eh O Shepherd יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל׀ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הַאֲזִ֗ינָה <S%H238><s%> ha-'a-Zi-nah, Give ear נֹהֵ֣ג <S%H5090><s%> no-Heg thou that leadest כַּצֹּ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> katz-Tzon like a flock יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef; Joseph יֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev thou that dwellest הַכְּרוּבִ֣ים <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-ru-Vim [between] the cherubims הוֹפִֽיעָה׃ <S%H3313><s%> ho-Fi-'ah. shine forth

לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei Before אֶפְרַ֨יִם׀ <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim Ephraim וּבִנְיָ֘מִ֤ן <S%H1144><s%> u-vin-Ya-Min and Benjamin וּמְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> u-me-nash-Sheh, and Manasseh עוֹרְרָ֥ה <S%H5782><s%> 'or-Rah stir up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּבֽוּרָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1369><s%> ge-vu-ra-Te-cha; thy strength וּלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> u-le-Chah and come לִישֻׁעָ֣תָה <S%H3444><s%> li-shu-'A-tah [and] save לָּֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ <S%H7725><s%> ha-shi-Ve-nu; Turn us again וְהָאֵ֥ר <S%H215><s%> ve-ha-'Er to shine פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha, and cause thy face וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃ <S%H3467><s%> ve-niv-va-She-'ah. and we shall be saved

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot; of hosts עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against מָתַ֥י <S%H4970><s%> ma-Tai How עָ֝שַׁ֗נְתָּ <S%H6225><s%> 'a-Shan-ta, how long wilt thou be angry בִּתְפִלַּ֥ת <S%H8605><s%> bit-fil-Lat against the prayer עַמֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Me-cha. You

הֶ֭אֱכַלְתָּם <S%H398><s%> He-'e-chal-tom Thou feedest לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem them with the bread דִּמְעָ֑ה <S%H1832><s%> dim-'Ah; of tears וַ֝תַּשְׁקֵ֗מוֹ <S%H8248><s%> vat-tash-Ke-mov, to drink בִּדְמָע֥וֹת <S%H1832><s%> bid-ma-'ot and givest them tears שָׁלִֽישׁ׃ <S%H7991><s%> sha-Lish. in great measure

תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ <S%H7760><s%> te-si-Me-nu Thou makest מָ֭דוֹן <S%H4066><s%> Ma-don us a strife לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H7934><s%> lish-che-Nei-nu; unto our neighbours וְ֝אֹיְבֵ֗ינוּ <S%H341><s%> ve-'o-ye-Vei-nu, and our enemies יִלְעֲגוּ־ <S%H3932><s%> yil-'a-gu- laugh לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God צְבָא֣וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ <S%H7725><s%> ha-shi-Ve-nu; Turn us again וְהָאֵ֥ר <S%H215><s%> ve-ha-'Er to shine פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha, and cause thy face וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃ <S%H3467><s%> ve-niv-va-She-'ah. and we shall be saved

גֶּ֭פֶן <S%H1612><s%> Ge-fen a vine מִמִּצְרַ֣יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim out of Egypt תַּסִּ֑יעַ <S%H5265><s%> tas-Si-a'; Thou hast brought תְּגָרֵ֥שׁ <S%H1644><s%> te-ga-Resh thou hast cast out גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim, the heathen וַתִּטָּעֶֽהָ׃ <S%H5193><s%> vat-tit-ta-'E-ha. and planted

פִּנִּ֥יתָ <S%H6437><s%> pin-Ni-ta Thou preparedst לְפָנֶ֑יהָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-ha; [room] before וַתַּשְׁרֵ֥שׁ <S%H8327><s%> vat-tash-Resh root שָׁ֝רָשֶׁ֗יהָ <S%H8328><s%> ra-Shei-ha, it and didst cause it to take deep וַתְּמַלֵּא־ <S%H4390><s%> vat-te-mal-le- and it filled אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. the land

כָּסּ֣וּ <S%H3680><s%> kas-Su were covered הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim The hills צִלָּ֑הּ <S%H6738><s%> tzil-Lah; with the shadow וַ֝עֲנָפֶ֗יהָ <S%H6057><s%> va-'a-na-Fei-ha, of it and the boughs אַֽרְזֵי־ <S%H730><s%> 'ar-zei- cedars אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> 'El. thereof [were like] the goodly

תְּשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> te-shal-Lach She sent out קְצִירֶ֣הָ <S%H7105><s%> ke-tzi-Re-ha her boughs עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> Yam; unto the sea וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- to נָ֝הָ֗ר <S%H5104><s%> na-Har, unto the river יֽוֹנְקוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H3127><s%> Yon-ko-Tei-ha. and her branches

לָ֭מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why פָּרַ֣צְתָּ <S%H6555><s%> pa-Ratz-ta Why hast thou [then] broken down גְדֵרֶ֑יהָ <S%H1447><s%> ge-de-Rei-ha; her hedges וְ֝אָר֗וּהָ <S%H717><s%> ve-'a-Ru-ha, do pluck כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֹ֥בְרֵי <S%H5674><s%> oe-rei so that all they which pass דָֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> Da-rech. by the way

יְכַרְסְמֶ֣נָּֽה <S%H3765><s%> ye-char-se-Men-nah doth waste חֲזִ֣יר <S%H2386><s%> cha-Zir The boar מִיָּ֑עַר <S%H3293><s%> mi-Ya-'ar; out of the wood וְזִ֖יז <S%H2123><s%> ve-Ziz it and the wild beast שָׂדַ֣י <S%H7704><s%> sa-Dai of the field יִרְעֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H7462><s%> yir-'En-nah. doth devour

אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him we beseech thee O God צְבָאוֹת֮ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'Ot of hosts שֽׁ֫וּב־ <S%H7725><s%> Shuv- Return נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na now הַבֵּ֣ט <S%H5027><s%> hab-Bet look down מִשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> mish-sha-Ma-yim from heaven וּרְאֵ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'Eh; and behold וּ֝פְקֹ֗ד <S%H6485><s%> u-fe-Kod, and visit גֶּ֣פֶן <S%H1612><s%> Ge-fen this vine זֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> Zot. Even

וְ֭כַנָּה <S%H3657><s%> Ve-chan-nah the shoot אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נָטְעָ֣ה <S%H5193><s%> na-te-'Ah hath planted יְמִינֶ֑ךָ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-Ne-cha; which thy right hand וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and on בֵּ֝֗ן <S%H1121><s%> Ben, and the branch אִמַּ֥צְתָּה <S%H553><s%> 'im-Matz-tah [that] thou madest strong לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

שְׂרֻפָ֣ה <S%H8313><s%> se-ru-Fah [It is] burned בָאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> va-'Esh with fire כְּסוּחָ֑ה <S%H3683><s%> ke-su-Chah; [it is] cut down מִגַּעֲרַ֖ת <S%H1606><s%> mig-ga-'a-Rat at the rebuke פָּנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha of thy countenance יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <S%H6><s%> yo-Ve-du. they perish

תְּֽהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> te-hi- Let יָ֭דְךָ <S%H3027><s%> Ya-de-cha Let thy hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- be upon אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish be upon the man יְמִינֶ֑ךָ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-Ne-cha; of thy right hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- upon the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man אִמַּ֥צְתָּ <S%H553><s%> 'im-Matz-ta [whom] thou madest strong לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- shall not נָס֥וֹג <S%H5472><s%> na-Sog So will not we go back מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Me-ka; at תְּ֝חַיֵּ֗נוּ <S%H2421><s%> te-chai-Ye-nu, from thee quicken וּבְשִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> u-ve-shim-Cha upon thy name נִקְרָֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> nik-Ra. us and we will call

יְה֘וָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God צְבָא֣וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ <S%H7725><s%> ha-shi-Ve-nu; Turn us again הָאֵ֥ר <S%H215><s%> ha-'Er to shine פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha, cause thy face וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃ <S%H3467><s%> ve-niv-va-She-'ah. and we shall be saved
